Functions
DistancePointToLine
float DistancePointToLine(
Caustic::Vector2& p0,
Caustic::Vector2& p1,
Caustic::Vector2& pt
)

DistancePointToLine returns the shortest distance from a given point to a line.

Parameters
p0
Caustic::Vector2&

First point defining the line

p1
Caustic::Vector2&

Second point defining the line

pt
Caustic::Vector2&

Point to test against line

Determinant3x3
float Determinant3x3(
float a00,
float a01,
float a02,
float a10,
float a11,
float a12,
float a20,
float a21,
float a22
)

Computes the determinant of a 3x3 matrix.  This is a temporary function. At some point I should just add general support for 3x3 matrices, but would rather have this simple function instead of a half implemented Matrix3x3 class.

CircumCircle
void CircumCircle(

Vector2 &p1,
Vector2 &p2,
Vector2 *pCircumCenter,

Computes the circumcircle for a given triangle.  For complete details on the math see: http://​mathworld​.wolfram​.com​/Circumcircle​.html

PointInTriangleCircumcircle
bool PointInTriangleCircumcircle(
Vector2 &p0,
Vector2 &p1,
Vector2 &p2,
Vector2 &pt
)

Tests whether the specified point is inside the circumcircle for the given triangle.

Parameters
p0
Vector2&

First point in the triangle

p1
Vector2&

Second point in the triangle

p2
Vector2&

Third point in the triangle

pt
Vector2&

Point to test

Returns

True if point is inside the circumcircle
